verses.text: Ach in Diosal, ak' a tojolal yet' a wach' pensaril t'a winh rey tik, aton yuninal winh rey sik'b'ilel uuj,
yic wach' t'a stojolal yet' t'a swach'ilal syak' yajalil winh t'a a chonhab' yet' t'a heb' meb'a'.
Yuj chi', ol aj junk'olal yet' tojolal t'a skal heb' a chonhab' cajan t'a jolomtac witz yet' t'a tzalquixtac.
Tojol ol yutoc winh rey tik sb'oan yaj t'a heb' meb'a'. Ol coljoc heb' ayoch t'a yalanh mheb'ail yuj winh. Axo heb' ixtum anima, ol ak'joc syaelal heb' yuj winh.
Yak'ocab'em sb'a heb' a chonhab' t'ayach, yacb'an ayto ek' k'u yet' k'een uj t'a masanil tiempo.
Yak'ocab' swach'k'olal winh rey icha nhab', ma icha yal ak'wal tz'ak'anoch yaal lum lum yet' anh ank'ultak.
Ayokab' wach'ilal yet' tojolal t'a yol stiempoal winh, masanto ol satel k'een uj.
Yak'ocab' yajalil winh t'a yib'anh masanil, schael yich t'a sti' ha' mar, masanto t'a sti' junxo ha' mar chi'. D'a sti' ha' niwan Éufrates, masanto b'aj slajwik'och lum lum tik.
Ha heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'a winh, aton heb' cajan t'a tzinan lu'um, yak'ocab'em sb'a heb' t'a winh t'a emnaquilal masanto tz'emk'och tenan sti' heb' t'a sat lu'um.
Masanil heb' winh sreyal juntzanh chonhab', aton Tarsis, juntzanh ay t'a stitac ha' mar, Sabá yet' Seba, yak'ocab' silab' heb' yet' yalcabar t'a winh.
Emocab' cuman heb' rey smasanil t'a winh. Ak'jocab' serwil winh yuj masanil nación.
Yujto a winh ol colanel heb' meb'a' syal sb'a t'ay, aton heb' ayoch t'a tzapan majanil malaj mach scolani.
Ol ok' sk'ol winh yuj heb' meb'a' ilb'aj k'ool. Ol coljoquel heb' t'a yol sk'ab' chamel yuj winh.
Ol coljoquel heb' t'a yol sk'ab' heb' ixtum anima yet' t'a yol sk'ab' heb' comonnhej sb'at t'a yib'anh heb' yetanimail, yujto niwan yelk'och sk'inal heb' meb'a' chi' t'a yichanh winh.
Aynhejocab' sk'inal winh rey chi'. Ak'jocab' k'een oro yic Sabá t'a winh. k'anjocab' sk'inal winh d'ha Dios. Alchajnhejocab' wach' lolonel t'a winh.

Te wach'ocab' tz'aj ixim trigo t'a sat lum ko lu'um tik. Yak'ocab' ixim t'a jolomtac witz. Q'uib'ocab' ixim trigo icha tz'aj sq'uib' te te' t'a Líbano. Q'uib'ocab' sb'isul anima t'a ko chonhab' tik icha anh ank'ultak t'a sat lu'um.
Nachajocab'cot winh rey t'a masanil tiempo. Aynhejocab' sb'inajnaquil winh icha k'u. Masanilocab' nación schaan wach'ilal yuj winh. Yalocab' heb' to te wach' yic winh.
Alchajocab' wach' lolonel t'a Jehová Dios, aton ko Diosal a onh israel onh tik. Anhej syal sk'ulan juntzanh tas sat ko k'ool quilani.
Alchajocab' wach' lolonel t'ay t'a masanil tiempo. Ojtacajocab'el sb'inajnaquil t'a masanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik. Yik'ocab' icha chi'.
Aton t'a tik ix lajwican slesal winhaj Dawid, yuninal winhaj Isaí.
